mapper.insert:
SELECT seq_board_pk.nextval FROM dual
INSERT INTO board (no, title, content, hit, reg_date, user_no) VALUES(#{no},#{title}, #{content}, 0, sysdate, #{userNo})
mapper.select: SELECT b.no, b.title, b.content, b.hit, b.reg_date as regDate, b.user_no as userNo, u.name as userName FROM board b, users u WHERE b.user_no = u.no ORDER BY b.reg_date DESC
SELECT b.no, b.title, b.content, b.hit, b.reg_date as regDate, b.user_no as userNo, u.name as userName FROM board b, users u WHERE b.user_no = u.no AND b.no=#{value}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM board WHERE no = #{no} AND user_no = #{userNo}
